course_description: Pre-requisites: BIOS 500, EPI 530, and EPI 534 or EPI 533 (concurrent ok).  This course develops epidemiologic concepts introduced in Epidemiologic Methods I, providing a more advanced discussion of issues related to bias, study design, interaction, as well as an introduction to logistic regression for epidemiologic analyses.
